title: Ronan Farrow reveals he and boyfriend Jon Lovett are engaged
text:
Ronan Farrow has revealed that he is engaged to be married.

The Catch and Kill author writes in his new book that he popped the question to boyfriend Jon Lovett in a draft of his new book that he gave the Pod Save America host to proof.

Farrow writes that he sent Lovett the proof after he decided to include their relationship in the book, and 'put in a question right on this page: "Marriage?" On the moon or even here on earth.'

Lovett found the proposal writes Farrow, and said 'sure.'

Scroll down for video

Caught: Ronan Farrow is set to marry boyfriend Jon Lovett after proposing in a draft copy of her book Catch and Kill

Farrow writes about Lovett's constant support throughout his book.

Lovett was also the one who had to calm Farrow down after he received a call during the first week of October 2017, informing him that Weinstein and attorney and Lisa Bloom were heading to the Times' office in Midtown Manhattan.

The meeting, he was told, was taking place because the paper was set to run its first piece from reporters Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey.

And that is when an underfed and sleep deprived Farrow broke down in tears.

'It's good it's breaking,' Farrow recalls telling Lovett.

'It's just - all these months. This whole year. And now I have no job.'

Farrow writes that he then began crying as he told Lovett: 'I swung too wide. I gambled too much. And maybe I won't even have a story at the end of it.'

He then added: 'And I'm letting down all these women.'

Lovett cut Farrow off and urged him to 'calm down,' noting that he had not 'slept or eaten in two weeks.'

And when he later realized the Farrow was calling him while inside a cab, Lovett offered him another piece of advice.

'Oh my God. We are going to talk about this,' said Lovett.

'But first you are going to tip that driver really well.'
